name: Should return appropriate response codes for complete and incomplete required fields.
fullName: ru.stellarburgers.LoginUserParameterizedTest.shouldReturnCorrectStatusForAuthorization[Authorization with email "test@test.te" and password "" should return response code 401]
description:
1.Verify that a user can be authorized with valid required fields.
Expected result: HTTP 200 response, The fields "email" and "name" contain data entered by the user when registering, The "accessToken" and "refreshToken" fields in the response body contain non-null values.
2.Verify that a user cannot be authorized if one of the fields is missing
Expected result: HTTP 401 response, response field "success" - false and an error message "email or password are incorrect" in response body.
descriptionHtml:
1.Verify that a user can be authorized with valid required fields.
Expected result: HTTP 200 response, The fields "email" and "name" contain data entered by the user when registering, The "accessToken" and "refreshToken" fields in the response body contain non-null values.
2.Verify that a user cannot be authorized if one of the fields is missing
Expected result: HTTP 401 response, response field "success" - false and an error message "email or password are incorrect" in response body.

steps.name: Assert that user is not logged in
